questionTitle: Which of the following programming medium makes social networking widgets more prevalent than the past?
questionExplanation: Many social networking sites have widget galleries that contain clocks, calendars, animations, weather information, electronic Post-It notes, and many more

questionOption1: Discussions are often indexed by the major search engines
questionOption2: Few social networking sites have the ability to create blogs
questionOption3: A widget is a small utility that you can add to your page
questionExplanation: Most social networking sites have the ability to create blogs.

questionTitle: Which of the following is not a social networking site?
questionExplanation: Itsmy is a mobile social network.

questionTitle: Which of the following figure is correct according to categories shown?
questionExplanation: The emergence of cloud networks,lowered cost of computing and high cost of travel helped popularity of collaborative software.

questionOption1: myYearbook is used for general social network
questionOption2: MySpace is used as a social networking site for Asian relationships
questionOption3: Livemocha is used for language learning purpose
questionExplanation: Multiply is used as a social networking site for Asian relationships.

questionTitle: Which of the following social networking site is used for Business and professional networking?
questionExplanation: Mixi is a Japanese social network.

questionTitle: Which of the following social networking site is used for locating friends and family?
Which of the following is the largest Chinese social networking site?
questionExplanation: ResearchGATE is used for science research.

questionTitle: Which of the following offers a desktop application or browser add-in for aggregating Webmail and social network accounts?
Which of the following offers an SaaS service that provides online analysis and measurement of social media tools?
questionExplanation: Gnip offers an aggregation API for developers.
